Package Combat.projectiles

Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
Combat.projectiles.Projectile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Hitbox
Direct Known Subclasses:
AngelProjectile, BaconProjectile, BoneProjectile, DemonProjectile, EggProjectile, GateProjectile, GearProjectile, MilkProjectile

prathamhebbar

  • Constructor Details

    • Projectile

      public Projectile(float x, float y, int life, int damage, float speed, float angle, int pierce, boolean friendly)
      Creates a Projectile
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      life - total lifetime of the projectile (frames)
      damage - damage of the projectile
      speed - speed of the projectile (pixels/frame)
      angle - angle of the projectile
      pierce - how many hitboxes this projectile can impact before disappearing
      friendly - whether or not this projectile came from the player or the enemy

  • Method Details

    • getLife

      public int getLife()
      Returns:
      remaining life of this projectile

      public int getDamage()
      Returns:
      damage of this projectile

    • setVelocity

      public void setVelocity(int velocity)
      Parameters:
      velocity - new speed of the projectile

    • getVelocity

      public double getVelocity()
      Returns:
      current speed of the projectile

    • move

      public void move(int destinationX, int destinationY)
      next tick of the projectile's movement
      Parameters:
      destinationX - x coordinate which the projectile is shot at
      destinationY - y coordinate which the projectile is shot at

    • handleCollision

      public boolean handleCollision(Hitbox H)
      simulate collision with another hitbox
      Parameters:
      H - hitbox which is collided with
      Returns:
      true if this projectile has successfully hit the hitbox, false if not

    • kill

      public void kill()
      kills this projectile

    • shoot

      public void shoot(int destinationX, int destinationY)
      Shoots a projectile at a certain target coordinate
      Parameters:
      destinationX - target x coordinate
      destinationY - target y coordinate

      Returns:
      current angle

    • isFriendly

      public boolean isFriendly()
      Returns:
      true if the projectile is shot from the player, false otherwise

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Returns:
      true if the projectile is still alive, false otherwise
